name: Kongol's Struggle
description:
A Real Atari 2600 game, playable in emulator (”Stella” recommended)!

Featuring:
-Easy to learn, difficult to master gameplay of controlling Kongol as
he attempts to duck under doorways too small for him
-Dozens of seconds of gameplay!
-Press Up and Down to align Kongol, and the Button to squeeze 
forward
-Get a point for getting in the doorway
-Lose all your points for missing the doorway
-Empathise with Kongol’s deep character, forced to exist in a world
that doesn’t accomodate him

Source Code available at https://github.com/yoyatime/doorframe
